name: Did I really become the Hell Lord just To Buy an Angelic Next Generation Console?
name_original: Did I really become the Hell Lord just To Buy an Angelic Next Generation Console?
description:
Help the "Player" in his journey to become a Lord Of Hell, just to get enough money to buy the new next-gen-console-pc-gaming-all-included : the PrayStation.

This is just a prototype and commitment for the WonderJam 2 : Idle. It will be further developed with more instruments after the jam, so stay tuned for new updates!
